venue.name: Wild Rover Bar Boston - 1 Block from Faneuil Hall

item.description:
** Yep, you read that right. The Boston Singles First Anniversary Party is FREE and they will continue to be FREE from now on! **


The First Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta!

-- Boston Singles 1st Anniversary Party --


Join us for a fun night of Mexican food, drinks, trivia & salsa dancing! The DJ will be playing the best salsa tracks and testing your knowledge of Mexican facts. Dress in your best Mexican garb and remember to bring your sombrero, because it's time for the First Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta!


The Essential Deets


-- Friday, May 3rd, 2013 --
-- 7 PM - 2 AM --
-- Free Admission 21+ --
-- Sexy Ice-Breaker Games -- 
-- One Free Drink 7-8 --
-- Free Mexican Food 7-9 -- 
-- Salsa Dancing Lessons 9-11 --
-- Flirting & Socializing All Night! --


Single and Ready to Mingle? Then come on out to the next Boston Singles Party!


RSVP IN 1 MEETUP GROUP ONLY, NO DOUBLES.

DOUBLE RSVP ON PLENTY OF FISH IF YOU CAN, IT WILL HELP MAKE THIS A BETTER PARTY!



When you arrive, you will see Alex at the door. Tell him which Meetup group you're with sign in with him. Then proceed to the second floor where the party begins!


Please introduce yourself to Matt, Alex and/or Joe your gracious hosts.


- Free Drink Details:


If you arrive between 7:00 and 8:00 pm, you will get a free drink ticket good for any beer, any wine, and lots of mixed drinks! (no shots or top-shelf liquor) Tickets will NOT be given out past 8 PM. Get there early! Tickets expire at 8:30, so even if you get there at 7:59, you can still use it. ;)


PLEASE! Tip the bartenders! A free drink for you means you should still tip the bartender!


- Free Food:


Buffet is available for everyone from 7 PM until 9 PM, refills when needed, and they're very good about keeping the food stocked, so take what you want!


The buffet includes fresh made tacos, cheese quesadillas, chicken & cheese quesadillas and chips and salsa. All cooked food is made fresh in the kitchen.


**NEW** Sexy Ice-Breaker Games!!


New at this party is the addition of games specifically for singles. The hilarity will ensue from 7 to 9 when the music will be low enough for people to gather round and start up a game to break the ice. Here's what we've got for games:


Table Topics - Dating Version


Break the ice or take things to a new level. Either way, these fun, flirty questions entertain and enlighten you as you enjoy our party. These questions are specifically designed to take the stress out of those first "getting to know you" conversations, and they provide a fun and easy way for people to talk about themselves and their budding friendships.


The Worst-Case Scenario - Dating Edition


The box says it's "For 2 or more Adults", but the more the merrier! You should probably be warned as this Worst-Case game does deal with adult themes involving, among other things, how to put condoms on, removing bras, and, well, dating and sex! All in a nonjudgmental matter of fact way of course.


Would You Rather...? Ultimate Sex Edition


This ultimate collection of carnal quandaries features over 700 deranged dilemmas concerning matters of the flesh. Wallow in your immaturity as you savor the guilty pleasures of debating such absurd questions!



** NOTE ** There are several copies of each of the above games so there will plenty of games for everyone. :D


❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤


Invited Meetup Groups are:


1. Boston Singles:
http://www.meetup.com/BostonSingles/


2. Social Fun:


http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun/events/114702252/


3. Free & Cheap Things to Do in Boston:


http://www.fact-boston.com/events/114704062/


4. The Middle (30-45 yrs):


http://www.meetup.com/The-Middle-30-45-yrs/events/114704532/


5. Plenty of Fish:


http://forums.plentyoffish.com/datingPosts15989054.aspx


6. Awesome In Boston:


http://www.meetup.com/Awesome-In-Boston/events/114934852/


7. Mix-Your-World Diversity Connection


http://www.meetup.com/Mix-Your-World-Diversity-Connection/events/115631282/


8. Young Bostonians


http://www.meetup.com/Young-Bostonians/events/115658692/


9. Boston's Most Eligible:


http://www.meetup.com/Bostonsmosteligible/events/115790322/


10. Boston Nights


http://www.meetup.com/bostonnights/events/115642462/


11. Boston Metro Hike, Bike & Social Club


http://www.meetup.com/BMSocial/events/115642072/


Contact me (Matt Adams) if you run a Meetup group and would like to make this event available to your members.


❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤


Join us for the FREE Single De Mayo Fiesta! With a free drink, Mexican food, salsa lessons and the sexy games, this party is going to be even more fun and flirtatious!!


See you there!


~Matt


❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤


Parking For This Event:


Street parking is possible but it can be tough. Try your luck if you come early.


Otherwise, $7 Parking after 5PM and on weekends is available at International Place Garage, 1 International Place, Boston, MA 02110 Entrance: 55 Purchase St. (0.35 miles from the Wild Rover) Please note it says this coupon is not valid all the time, mainly during POSTED EVENTS.


Use this link to print the coupon.


http://boston.centralparking.com/Boston-1-International-Place-Parking-Parking-Coupon.html


Other nearby parking: http://boston.centralparking.com/parking-near/Boston-60-State-Street.html


Taking the T:


The closet T stop is the Aquarium stop on the Blue line, and you would take the State Street exit. The next easiest T stop would be State Street stop on the Orange line.
item.name: FREE! First Annual Single De Mayo Fiesta! - 438+ RSVP's
